og.title: Newborns struggle when moms use drugs

twitter.title: Newborns struggle when moms use drugs
twitter.description: DOVER ­– The cry of a newborn baby can be a beautiful sound for new parents. But for babies born to drug-addicted mothers, the cries may not just be the shock of entering a confusing new world. It also may be the pain of drug withdrawal.Many Seacoast communities are seeing a rise in heroin and prescription opioid addiction. With it, area hospitals are seeing an increase in the number of newborns who enter the world drug dependent. These babies often suffer from neonatal
